meta.description: We are a company specializing in the production of complex, precision steel structures and metal processing in the Silesia region for leading manufacturers in the electro-energetic, automotive, and machinery industries. We provide services in laser cutting, machining, welding, milling, etc.

meta.twitterCard: If you need complex details, made with the highest precision, contact us.

hero.heading: Welding. Machining. Milling.
hero.question: What we Do
hero.answer: we specialize in making precise steel parts, as well as metal processing in Poland.

about.heading: Metana
about.paragraph: we specialize in the production of intricate and precise steel constructions, as well as metal processing in the Silesian region. Our expertise serves leading manufacturers in the electro-energy, automotive, and machinery industries. With a legacy dating back to 1994, started by P.P.H.U. METANA and P.P.H.U. METANA S.C. We have been a reliable presence in both national and international markets.

first.question: Are you hiring?
first.answer: Yes, we are actively looking for qualified individuals to join our team as manual lathe operators, and locksmiths. If you have the skills and experience for any of these positions, we encourage you to explore the opportunities available on our career page and submit your application. We look forward to potentially welcoming you to our company.

first.title: Panasonic Welding robot
first.about: Panasonic welding robots are at the forefront of cutting-edge technology for efficient and precise welding. With high-speed, high-precision motion control, these robots ensure accurate and consistent results in various applications. The user-friendly interfaces, integration with advanced welding power sources, and real-time monitoring through sensors and vision systems make Panasonic welding robots a reliable choice. Elevating our company productivity and welding quality with Panasonic's innovative robotic solutions.

second.title: Mazak Lathe
second.about: The Mazak Quick Turn 100M is a high-performance CNC turning center that combines speed and precision for optimal machining. This machine is equipped with advanced features, including a powerful spindle and smooth turret movement, ensuring efficient and accurate turning operations. Its user-friendly control interface allows for easy programming and operation. The Quick Turn 100M is designed to handle a variety of materials and deliver consistent results, making it a versatile and reliable solution for your machining needs. We have upgraded our manufacturing capabilities with Mazak's Quick Turn 100M for enhanced efficiency and precision.

third.title: Brother Milling machine
third.about: The Brother SPEEDIO S700X1 is a compact and high-speed machining center designed for versatility and efficiency. With a rapid tool change and fast acceleration/deceleration rates, it excels in quick and precise machining operations. The machine features a user-friendly control interface, making programming and operation straightforward. The S700X1 is equipped with advanced technologies for improved productivity, including high-speed spindle rotation and efficient chip evacuation. Whether we're dealing with intricate parts or high-volume production, the Brother SPEEDIO S700X1 provides a reliable solution for our machining needs, ensuring speed and precision in every operation.

fourth.title: Kovosvit Lathe
fourth.about: The Kovosvit MAS SP 180 is a robust and versatile CNC lathe designed for precision machining. With a sturdy construction and a powerful motor, it handles various turning tasks with ease. The SP 180 features a user-friendly interface for convenient operation and efficient workflow. Its precision controls and adjustable settings provide flexibility for different machining requirements.

third.question: Which materials do we usually work with?
